## Description {#details}

This struct is used to track simple keys.

Simple keys are handled by creating an entry in SimpleKeys for each <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/token">Token</a> which could legally be the start of a simple key. When peekNext is called, if the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/token">Token</a> To be returned is referenced by a <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-yamlparser-cpp-/simplekey">SimpleKey</a>, we continue tokenizing until that potential simple key has either been found to not be a simple key (we moved on to the next line or went further than 1024 chars). Or when we run into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, and then insert a Key token (and possibly others) before the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-yamlparser-cpp-/simplekey">SimpleKey</a>&#39;s Tok.

Definition at line 177 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/yamlparser-cpp">YAMLParser.cpp</a>.
